dcatapchr 0.0.0.3
  • Reference

Create a dct:publisher property in DCAT-AP CH standard

dct_publisher.Rd

dct_publisher() is modeled as a foaf:Organization, dct_publisher2() is modelled as a foaf:Agent in accordance with DCAT-AP CH v2. dct_publisher2() allows the specification of the foaf:name in more languages.

Usage

dct_publisher(
  publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",
  foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)"
)

dct_publisher2(
  publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",
  foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)",
  language = "it"
)

Arguments

publisher

character string with a publisher (usually an URL)

foaf_name

name of the organization/publisher

language

language of foaf:name. Can be one or more of "de", "fr", "it" or "en". Must have the same length as foaf_name.

Examples

dct_publisher(
  publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",
  foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)"
)
#> [1] "<dct:publisher>"                                                            
#> [2] "  <foaf:Organization rdf:about=\"https://www.ti.ch/ustat\">"                
#> [3] "    <foaf:name>Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)</foaf:name>"
#> [4] "  </foaf:Organization>"                                                     
#> [5] "</dct:publisher>"                                                           

dct_publisher2(
  publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",
  foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)",
  language = "it"
)
#> [1] "<dct:publisher>"                                                                            
#> [2] "  <foaf:Agent rdf:about=\"https://www.ti.ch/ustat\">"                                       
#> [3] "    <foaf:name xml:lang=\"it\">Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)</foaf:name>"
#> [4] "  </foaf:Agent>"                                                                            
#> [5] "</dct:publisher>"
